title: SECLI - CREATE MAPPING TABLE ON DOCUMENTUM SWITZERLAND LDN and JRS
time_sequence: CM - DATA VALIDATION IN PROD LIKE ENV.

task_list.instruction_title:
Transfer of the mapping table to DOCUMENTUM (SMSA server) 

CREATE MAPPING TABLE ON DOCUMENTUM LDN and JRS
-    dbsecli..V_PREVIOUS_NUMBER (mapping between CustomerID and Tiers number)
-    dbsecli..V_PREVIOUS_NUMBER_PERSON_ALL (mapping between CustomerID and Person number)
